nodes.text: The Maerdocia system was a star system located within the Maerdocian sector, a part of the galactic regions known as the Mid Rim and the Slice. It shared its name with the Maerdocian Senator of the New Republic Senate.
The Maerdocia system was established in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, authored by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace, which placed the system in grid square Q-13.
